title: Opinion: STAT+: FDA drug center’s new acting director fits a pattern of risky, internal contradictions among agency leadership
description: The FDA drug center’s new acting director Tracy Beth Høeg fits a pattern of risky, internal contradictions among agency leadership, a professor argues.
content: The FDA drug center’s new acting director Tracy Beth Høeg fits a pattern of risky, internal contradictions among agency leadership, a professor argues.
